name: Disney's American Dragon: Jake Long, Rise of the Huntsclan
name_original: Disney's American Dragon: Jake Long, Rise of the Huntsclan
description:
Disney's American Dragon: Jake Long, Rise of the Huntsclan is an action-platformer game. It came out on 12-10-2006. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Disney's American Dragon: Jake Long, Rise of the Huntsclan on Game Boy Advance.
